headline: GTAV
subtitle: First Person Mode
content:
You can switch the camera straight in to First Person Mode at any time during gameplay.

You can assign an entirely different control scheme for First Person Mode, independent of Third Person controls, via Pause Menu > Settings > Controls > First Person Control Type. Here you can also set custom look sensitivity, field of view, and elect to switch to Third Person cameras when your character is in certain situations.

Experiment and find a setup that suits your play style.
